content.prompt: In an experiment evaluating encoding strategies, a researcher taught participants 15 new psychological concepts. One group took notes to help learn the concepts while the other group was asked to create a mnemonic device for each concept. In this experiment, what is the independent variable?

choices.label: The number of concepts recalled on the test.
The method used to learn the concepts.
The style of notes that participants used.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
